title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode in build 20020416, it results in N redraws of the entire client area.
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: The redraws should be more efficient, only redrawing the affected area rather than the entire client area.
SR: To observe the redraws occurring, add the following line to the performPaint method in StyledText: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
